title: Fish and potatoes with tomato sauce

ingredients.content: 800 g potatoes, cut in pieces (3-4 cm)
30 g olive oil, plus extra for greasing

preparations.content: Place potatoes in Varoma dish and set aside. Lightly grease Varoma tray, place hake steaks on it and season with salt to taste. Set aside.
Place onions, garlic clove, carrots, olive oil, white wine, tomatoes, black pepper, 1 tsp salt and water in mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>.
Place Varoma without Varoma tray into position and steam <b>15 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.
Insert Varoma tray into Varoma dish, close lid and steam a further <b>15 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Season potatoes with salt to taste. Serve hake and potatoes with tomato sauce.
